verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, we adore You,
we worship and adore You:
glorify Your name in all the earth.
Glorify Your name,
Gorify Your name,
Glorify Your name in all the earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, we adore You,
we worship and adore You:
glorify Your name in all the earth.
Glorify Your name,
Gorify Your name,
Glorify Your name in all the earth

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit, we adore You,
we worship and adore You:
glorify Your name in all the earth.
Glorify Your name,
Gorify Your name,
Glorify Your name in all the earth.
